name: Monstralia (Surf Monster)
description:
Project made in association with the Health Start Foundation. Learn healthy eating habits and exercise by getting back the stolen food. Game developed and tested on mobile devices.

Controls:

Click and drag your mouse to move the monster around. Earn points by catching the food the seagull drops. The objective is to earn enough points in the level before time runs out. Further levels require more points to complete.

Responsibilities:

Coded mouse/touch controls, compiled assets into playable build, fix bugs found by testers, Scrum Master for the project.
